Package GUIElements

Class ScrollableHTMLDocument

java.lang.Object
GUIElements.GUIElement
GUIElements.Container
GUIElements.Pane
GUIElements.LeafPane
GUIElements.ScrollableHTMLDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScrollBarListener
public class ScrollableHTMLDocument
extends LeafPane
Class that implements the scrolling feature for the HTMLDocument. It contains a HTMLDocument and two scrollbars. All uncommented methods are redirections to the HTMLDocument methods.
